text:
Now, I realize that you guys have probably heard
about this other villain who stole the pyramid.

Apparently it's a big deal, people are calling it
the crime of the century and stuff like that.

A little, but we have had a pretty good year
ourselves and you guys are alright in my book.

No, no raises you are not
going to get any raises.

Well, we stole the
Time Square Jumbotron!

Yeah, you all like watching
football on that, huh?
We stole The Statue of Liberty.
The small one from Las Vegas.
And I won't even mention The Eiffel Tower.

Okay, I wasn't
going to tell you about this yet,

but I have been working on something very big
something that will blow this Pyramid thing out of
the water!

And thanks to the effort
of my good friend, Dr. Nefario.
Oh, there he is, he's styling.

Now we have located the shrink ray in a
secret lab and once we take this shrink ray,
we will have the capability...
...to pull off the true crime of the century.

Wait, wait, I haven't told
you what it is yet!
Next, we are going to steal...
